goal: How do I ready a guinea pig cage for it's new occupants?
trans_goal: 如何為新主人準備豚鼠籠？
sol1: Provide the guinea pig with a cage full of a few inches of bedding made of ripped paper strips, you will also need to supply it with a water bottle and a food dish.
trans_sol1: 為豚鼠提供一個裝滿幾英寸長的由撕破的紙條製成的墊料的籠子，您還需要為它提供一個水瓶和一個食物盤。
sol2: Provide the guinea pig with a cage full of a few inches of bedding made of ripped jeans material, you will also need to supply it with a water bottle and a food dish.
trans_sol2: 為豚鼠提供一個充滿幾英寸長的由破洞牛仔褲材料製成的床上用品的籠子，您還需要為其提供一個水瓶和一個食物盤。

goal: dresser
trans_goal: 梳妝台
sol1: replace drawer with bobby pin
trans_sol1: 用髮夾替換抽屜
sol2: finish, woodgrain with  bobby pin
trans_sol2: 飾面，木紋，帶髮夾

goal: To fight Ivan Drago in Rocky for sega master system.
trans_goal: 在《洛奇》中與伊万·德拉戈爭奪世嘉大師系統。
sol1: Drago isn't in this game because it was released before Rocky IV.
trans_sol1: 德拉戈沒有出現在這款遊戲中，因為它是在《洛奇 IV》之前發布的。
sol2: You have to defeat Apollo Creed and Clubber Lang first.
trans_sol2: 你必須先擊敗阿波羅·克里德和俱樂部伯·朗。

goal: Make outdoor pillow.
trans_goal: 製作戶外枕頭。
sol1: Blow into tin can and tie with rubber band.
trans_sol1: 向錫罐中吹氣並用橡皮筋紮緊。
sol2: Blow into trash bag and tie with rubber band.
trans_sol2: 向垃圾袋中吹氣並用橡皮筋紮緊。

goal: ice box
trans_goal: 冰盒
sol1: will turn into a cooler if you add water to it
trans_sol1: 如果你加水就會變成冷卻器
sol2: will turn into a cooler if you add soda to it
trans_sol2: 如果你加蘇打水就會變成一個冷卻器

goal: Remove soap scum from shower door.
trans_goal: 清除淋浴門上的肥皂殘渣。
sol1: Rub hard with bed sheets, then rinse.
trans_sol1: 用床單用力擦拭，然後沖洗。
sol2: Rub hard with dryer sheets, then rinse.
trans_sol2: 用烘乾紙用力擦拭，然後沖洗。

goal: Recycle a spray bottle for a new cleaner.
trans_goal: 回收噴霧瓶以換取新的清潔劑。
sol1: Open the top of the empty spray bottle and check for damage. Rinse the bottle then fill halfway with warm water. Replace the spray nozzle and pump a few times to clear the hose. Empty sparrow bottle and allow to dry before using with a new cleaner.
trans_sol1: 打開空噴霧瓶的頂部並檢查是否有損壞。沖洗瓶子，然後用溫水填充一半。更換噴嘴和泵幾次以清理軟管。倒空麻雀瓶並使其乾燥，然後再使用新的清潔劑。
sol2: Open the top of the empty spray bottle and check for damage. Rinse the bottle then fill halfway with warm water. Replace the spray nozzle and pump a few times to clear the hose. Empty spray bottle and allow to dry before using with a new cleaner.
trans_sol2: 打開空噴霧瓶的頂部並檢查是否有損壞。沖洗瓶子，然後用溫水填充一半。更換噴嘴和泵幾次以清理軟管。清空噴霧瓶並使其乾燥，然後再使用新的清潔劑。

goal: How do you attach toilet paper to a glass jar?
trans_goal: 如何將衛生紙粘在玻璃罐上？
sol1: Press a piece of double-sided tape to the glass jar and then press the toilet paper onto the tape.
trans_sol1: 將一塊雙面膠帶壓在玻璃罐上，然後將衛生紙壓在膠帶上。
sol2: Spread mayonnaise all over the jar with your palms and then roll the jar in toilet paper.
trans_sol2: 用手掌將蛋黃醬塗抹在罐子上，然後用衛生紙將罐子捲起來。

goal: How to make tissue paper window decorations?
trans_goal: 如何製作薄紙窗飾？
sol1: Find tissue paper and fold it in half. Take scissors and cut out pieces of the paper in the middle. When you are done tape it to your window.
trans_sol1: 找到薄紙並將其對折。拿剪刀，剪掉中間的紙片。完成後將其粘貼到窗戶上。
sol2: Find tissue paper and fold it in half. Take scissors and tear out pieces of the paper in the middle. When you are done tape it to your window.
trans_sol2: 找到薄紙並將其對折。拿剪刀，把中間的紙片撕下來。完成後將其粘貼到窗戶上。

goal: Neatly wrap up an extension cord.
trans_goal: 整齊地纏繞延長線。
sol1: Wrap the cord around your hand and elbow.
trans_sol1: 將繩子纏繞在您的手和肘部上。
sol2: Wrap the cord around your hand and knee.
trans_sol2: 將繩子纏繞在您的手和膝蓋上。

goal: Extend life of flowers in vase.
trans_goal: 延長花瓶中鮮花的壽命。
sol1: Add small amount of coffee in vase.
trans_sol1: 在花瓶中加入少量咖啡。
sol2: Add small amount of 7UP in vase.
trans_sol2: 在花瓶中添加少量 7UP。

goal: how do you put eyelashes on?
trans_goal: 你怎麼貼睫毛？
sol1: glue them on with mascara.
trans_sol1: 用睫毛膏將它們粘上。
sol2: put eyelash glue on the fake eyelashes and then let it get tacky. then, place it on top of your actual eyelashes and let it dry on.
trans_sol2: 將睫毛膠塗在假睫毛上，然後讓它發粘。然後，將其放在您的真睫毛上並讓其乾燥。

goal: Find spices easily in the kitchen.
trans_goal: 在廚房輕鬆找到香料。
sol1: Arrange spices from hot to mild in the kitchen in order to find them by taste.
trans_sol1: 在廚房裡按照從熱到溫和的順序排列香料，以便根據口味找到它們。
sol2: Arrange your spices alphabetically to make finding them easy.
trans_sol2: 按字母順序排列香料，以便輕鬆找到它們。

goal: peeler
trans_goal: 削皮器
sol1: can be used as a decoration on a television
trans_sol1: 可以用作電視上的裝飾品
sol2: can be used as a decoration on a sock
trans_sol2: 可以用作襪子上的裝飾

goal: How to clean blinds without tearing them up
trans_goal: 如何在不撕破百葉窗的情況下清潔百葉窗
sol1: Place a cloth on each side of a pair of tongs.
trans_sol1: 在鉗子的兩側各放一塊布。
sol2: Find a feather duster, and cut the feathers off every two inches.
trans_sol2: 找到雞毛撣子，每隔兩英寸將羽毛剪掉。

goal: What material is a steel rocking chair made out of?
trans_goal: 鋼搖椅由什麼材料製成？
sol1: The frame is steel and then fabric can be added if you wish.
trans_sol1: 框架是鋼製的，如果您願意，可以添加織物。
sol2: The frame is plastic and fabric can be added if you wish
trans_sol2: 框架是塑料的，如果您願意，可以添加織物

goal: To get a video game console for a cheap price,
trans_goal: 為了以便宜的價格獲得視頻遊戲機，
sol1: look for the console on a website that sells used goods.
trans_sol1: 在銷售二手商品的網站上查找控制台。
sol2: look up which console is the cheapest one in store.
trans_sol2: 查找商店中哪一款控制台最便宜。

goal: How do you properly prepare a steak.
trans_goal: 如何正確準備牛排。
sol1: Take the steak out of warm storage and let come to room temperature, generously add salt and pepper to both sides and let sit for 10 minutes.
trans_sol1: 將牛排從溫暖的儲藏室中取出，恢復至室溫，在兩面充分加入鹽和胡椒粉，靜置 10 分鐘。
sol2: Take the steak out of cold storage and let come to room temperature, generously add salt and pepper to both sides and let sit for 10 minutes.
trans_sol2: 將牛排從冷藏室中取出，恢復至室溫，在兩面充分加入鹽和胡椒粉，靜置 10 分鐘。

goal: To cream butter and sugar together, you can
trans_goal: 將黃油和糖混合在一起，你可以
sol1: Place it in a bowl and use a hand warmer
trans_sol1: 將其放入碗中並使用暖手寶
sol2: Place in a bowl and use a hand mixer
trans_sol2: 放入碗中並使用手動攪拌機

goal: How to best cut the meat to place on a grill?
trans_goal: 如何最好地切肉放在烤架上？
sol1: Place a knife on the grill for around 15 minutes for the blade to be red hot. Gently push the knife through the meat to get a perfect cut.
trans_sol1: 將刀放在烤架上大約 15 分鐘，使刀片變紅。輕輕地將刀穿過肉，以獲得完美的切割效果。
sol2: Use a sharp knife or scissor and cut the meat properly as per the required size.
trans_sol2: 使用鋒利的刀或剪刀，將肉按照所需的尺寸適當切割。

goal: What alcohol do you pour for a mojito?
trans_goal: 喝莫吉托時要倒什麼酒？
sol1: Fill the glass with ice cubes so it’s half full. Pour in 2 shots of white rum & 1-2 shots of freshly squeezed orange juice.
trans_sol1: 在玻璃杯中加入冰塊，使其達到半滿。倒入2杯白朗姆酒和1-2杯鮮榨橙汁。
sol2: Fill the glass with ice cubes so it’s all full. Pour in 2 shots of white rum & 1-2 shots of freshly squeezed orange juice.
trans_sol2: 將玻璃杯裝滿冰塊。倒入2杯白朗姆酒和1-2杯鮮榨橙汁。

goal: How to start an automatic transmission car.
trans_goal: 如何啟動自動變速箱汽車。
sol1: Be sure it is in park, insert key into ignition, twist ignition key to start the car, release the key right after, car is now running.
trans_sol1: 確保處於停車狀態，將鑰匙插入點火開關，旋轉點火鑰匙啟動汽車，然後立即鬆開鑰匙，汽車現在正在行駛。
sol2: Be sure it is in park, insert key into ignition, twist ignition key to start the car, do not release the key right after, car is now running.
trans_sol2: 確保處於停車狀態，將鑰匙插入點火開關，旋轉點火鑰匙啟動汽車，不要立即鬆開鑰匙，汽車正在行駛。

goal: How to make sure all the clocks in the house are set accurately?
trans_goal: 如何確保家裡所有的時鐘都設置準確？
sol1: Get a solar clock for a reference and place it just outside a window that gets lots of sun. Use a system of call and response once a month, having one person stationed at the solar clock who yells out the correct time and have another person move to each of the indoor clocks to check if they are showing the right time. Adjust as necessary.
trans_sol1: 準備一個太陽能時鐘作為參考，並將其放置在陽光充足的窗外。每月使用一次呼叫和響應系統，讓一個人站在太陽鐘前喊出正確的時間，並讓另一個人走到每個室內時鐘前檢查它們是否顯示正確的時間。根據需要進行調整。
sol2: Replace all wind-ups with digital clocks. That way, you set them once, and that's it. Check the batteries once a year or if you notice anything looks a little off.
trans_sol2: 將所有發條更換為數字時鐘。這樣，您只需設置一次，就可以了。每年檢查一次電池，或者如果您發現任何東西看起來有點不對勁。

goal: How do you make plain toast?
trans_goal: 簡單的吐司怎麼做呢？
sol1: Gather a slice of bread and a toaster, place the bread on the top of the toaster and push the button down, when the button pops up your toast is ready.
trans_sol1: 準備一片麵包和一個烤麵包機，將麵包放在烤麵包機頂部，按下按鈕，當按鈕彈出時，吐司就準備好了。
sol2: Gather a slice of bread and a toaster, place the bread into the toaster and push the button down, when the button pops up your toast is ready.
trans_sol2: 準備一片麵包和一個烤麵包機，將麵包放入烤麵包機中，按下按鈕，當按鈕彈出時，吐司就準備好了。

goal: Make a bulletin board.
trans_goal: 製作一個公告板。
sol1: Glue wine corks into a picture frame.
trans_sol1: 將葡萄酒瓶塞粘到相框上。
sol2: Glue wine bottles into a picture frame.
trans_sol2: 將酒瓶粘到相框上。

goal: How do you make raw nuts have more flavor.
trans_goal: 怎樣才能讓生堅果更有味道呢？
sol1: Boil the nuts in milk for about 20 minutes while stirring constantly.
trans_sol1: 將堅果放入牛奶中煮約 20 分鐘，同時不斷攪拌。
sol2: Toast the nuts in a skillet for a few minutes while stirring constantly.
trans_sol2: 將堅果放入煎鍋中烘烤幾分鐘，同時不斷攪拌。

goal: To prepare carrots before cooking with them, you can
trans_goal: 要在烹飪前準備胡蘿蔔，您可以
sol1: Run them in the sink under boiling water
trans_sol1: 將它們放在沸水下的水槽中運行
sol2: Run them in the sink under cold water
trans_sol2: 將它們放在冷水下的水槽中運行

goal: plastic bag
trans_goal: 塑料袋
sol1: can carry foil
trans_sol1: 可以攜帶箔片
sol2: can carry pole
trans_sol2: 可以攜帶桿子

goal: To discourage house flies from living in your home,
trans_goal: 為了阻止家蠅棲息在您家中，
sol1: keep basil plants in the kitchen or windows.
trans_sol1: 將羅勒植物放在廚房或窗戶裡。
sol2: keep lavender plants in the kitchen or window.
trans_sol2: 在廚房或窗戶上種植薰衣草植物。

goal: How to make Caramel Chocolate chip Girl Scout Cookie Vanilla Ice cream at home.
trans_goal: 如何在家製作焦糖巧克力片女童子軍餅乾香草冰淇淋。
sol1: In a medium mixing bowl combine 7 cups chilled Caramelized Onions, 2 14 oz. cans sweetened condensed milk 1 teaspoon Vanilla extract.  Beat with an electric mixer until soft Peaks form. Stir in 1 1/2 cups Caramel Chocolate Chip Girl Scout cookies (Sliced in 3/4" strips or crumbles)  and 1/2 cup Chocolate chips.  Transfer mixture to two 8x8x2 inch baking pans. Freeze about 8 hours until firm.
trans_sol1: 在一個中等大小的攪拌碗中混合 7 杯冷凍焦糖洋蔥，2 個 14 盎司。罐甜煉乳 1 茶匙香草精。用電動攪拌器攪拌直至形成軟峰。拌入1 1/2 杯焦糖巧克力片女童子軍餅乾（切成3/4 英寸條狀或碎塊）和1/2 杯巧克力片。將混合物轉移到兩個8x8x2 英寸烤盤中。冷凍約8 小時直至變硬。
sol2: In a medium mixing bowl combine 7 cups chilled whipping cream, 2 14 oz. cans sweetened condensed milk 1 teaspoon Vanilla extract.  Beat with an electric mixer until soft Peaks form. Stir in 1 1/2 cups Caramel Chocolate Chip Girl Scout cookies (Sliced in 3/4" strips or crumbles)  and 1/2 cup Chocolate chips.  Transfer mixture to two 8x8x2 inch baking pans. Freeze about 8 hours until firm.
trans_sol2: 在一個中等大小的攪拌碗中混合 7 杯冷凍鮮奶油，2 14 盎司。罐甜煉乳 1 茶匙香草精。用電動攪拌器攪拌直至形成軟峰。拌入1 1/2 杯焦糖巧克力片女童子軍餅乾（切成3/4 英寸條狀或碎塊）和1/2 杯巧克力片。將混合物轉移到兩個8x8x2 英寸烤盤中。冷凍約8 小時直至變硬。

goal: To combine cake ingredients.
trans_goal: 混合蛋糕原料。
sol1: In a large mixing bowl, combined three egg yolks and half of the white granulated sugar and whisk till it reaches a pale red berry mixture.
trans_sol1: 在一個大攪拌碗中，將三個蛋黃和一半白砂糖混合，攪拌直至形成淡紅色漿果混合物。
sol2: In a large mixing bowl, combined three egg yolks and half of the white granulated sugar and whisk till it reaches a pale lemony yellow mixture.
trans_sol2: 在一個大攪拌碗中，將三個蛋黃和一半白砂糖混合，攪拌直至形成淺檸檬黃色混合物。

goal: To prevent gunk buildup in cup holders of a car,
trans_goal: 為了防止汽車杯架中積聚污垢，
sol1: place coffee filters inside of the cup holders.
trans_sol1: 將咖啡過濾器放入杯架內。
sol2: pour a thin layer of oil into the cup holders.
trans_sol2: 在杯架中倒入一層薄薄的油。

goal: To quarter biscuits, you can
trans_goal: 要將餅乾切成四等份，您可以
sol1: Take the biscuit in your mouth and tear it into quarters
trans_sol1: 將餅乾放入口中，撕成四等分
sol2: Take the biscuit in your hand and tear it into quarters
trans_sol2: 將手中的餅乾撕成四等分

goal: To make a bedroom temperature colder without a fan or air conditioner,
trans_goal: 為了在沒有風扇或空調的情況下使臥室溫度降低，
sol1: hang up a thick, and dark blanket over the windows and then ensure their is proper air flow in the room.
trans_sol1: 在窗戶上掛一條又厚又黑的毯子，然後確保房間內空氣流通。
sol2: wave a large blanket up and down to generate a gust of wind to cool the room down when it gets too hot.
trans_sol2: 當房間太熱時，上下揮舞一條大毯子，產生一陣風，為房間降溫。

goal: how to get fluffy cookies
trans_goal: 如何獲得蓬鬆的餅乾
sol1: Chill cookie dough before putting it on a baking sheet. This will help prevent your butter from flattening and losing its fluffy texture.
trans_sol1: 在將餅乾麵團放在烤盤上之前先將其冷卻。這將有助於防止黃油變平並失去蓬鬆的質地。
sol2: Chill cookie dough before putting it on a parchment line fish platter. This will help prevent your butter from flattening and losing its fluffy texture.
trans_sol2: 將餅乾麵團冷卻，然後將其放在羊皮紙線魚盤上。這將有助於防止黃油變平並失去蓬鬆的質地。

goal: How to brine a turkey before cooking?
trans_goal: 烹飪前如何給火雞加鹽？
sol1: Boil water with spices and any adjuncts you'd like, bring the water to a cool temperature and then submerge the turkey for several hours in the cold brine
trans_sol1: 將水與香料和任何您想要的輔料一起煮沸，將水降至涼爽的溫度，然後將火雞浸入冷鹽水中幾個小時
sol2: Boil water with spices and any adjuncts you'd like, bring the water to a boiling temperature and then submerge the turkey for several hours in the hot brine
trans_sol2: 將水與香料和任何您想要的輔料一起煮沸，將水加熱至沸騰溫度，然後將火雞浸入熱鹽水中幾個小時

goal: To spare the plant while picking lettuce
trans_goal: 採摘生菜時要保護植物
sol1: grab one leaf with one hand, bend the plant stalk near the leaf with the other hand, and pull it down and away from the leaf.
trans_sol1: 用一隻手抓住一片葉子，用另一隻手彎曲靠近葉子的植物莖，然後將其向下拉，使其遠離葉子。
sol2: grab one leaf with one hand, hold the stalk near the leaf with the other hand, and then pull the leaf down breaking it from the plant.
trans_sol2: 用一隻手抓住一片葉子，用另一隻手握住靠近葉子的莖，然後將葉子向下拉，使其與植物分離。

goal: To cook perfectly golden pancakes,
trans_goal: 要想煎出完美金黃的煎餅，
sol1: keep the temperature high and cook quickly.
trans_sol1: 保持高溫并快速烹飪。
sol2: keep the temperature low for a longer time.
trans_sol2: 保持較低溫度較長時間。

goal: generate poetry by using random words.
trans_goal: 使用隨機單詞生成詩歌。
sol1: Find a bunch of letters you like, about 150 of them.  Print them on paper and cut them from one another.  Place the paper pieces in a cup.  Turn the cup upside down. Rewrite the letters you can see as words, add a few of your own and call it poetry.
trans_sol1: 找到一堆你喜歡的字母，大約 150 個。將它們打印在紙上，然後將它們剪下來。將紙片放入杯子中。將杯子倒置。將你能看到的字母重寫為單詞，添加一些你自己的字母，並將其稱為詩歌。
sol2: Find a bunch of words you like, about 50 of them.  Print them on paper and cut them from one another.  Place the paper pieces in a cup.  Turn the cup upside down. Rewrite the words you can see, add a few of your own and call it poetry.
trans_sol2: 找一堆你喜歡的單詞，大約50個。將它們打印在紙上，然後將它們剪下來。將紙片放入杯子中。將杯子倒置。重寫你能看到的單詞，添加一些你自己的單詞，稱之為詩歌。

goal: To fill a bucket with sand
trans_goal: 將桶裝滿沙子
sol1: Take a smaller pail and fill it with sand. Dump it on the ground. Repeat until the bucket is full.
trans_sol1: 拿一個較小的桶，裝滿沙子。把它倒在地上。重複此操作，直到桶裝滿。
sol2: Take a smaller pail and fill it with sand. Dump it into the bucket. Repeat until the bucket is full.
trans_sol2: 拿一個較小的桶，裝滿沙子。將其倒入桶中。重複此操作，直到桶裝滿。

goal: To set the J bolt into the concrete mix in the mold.
trans_goal: 將 J 螺栓放入模具中的混凝土混合物中。
sol1: Push in the J bolt into the poured concrete mix in the mold before it cures, making sure it's straight and square.
trans_sol1: 在固化前將 J 螺栓推入模具中澆注的混凝土混合物中，確保其筆直且方形。
sol2: Push in the J bolt into the poured concrete mix in the mold after it cures, making sure it's straight and square.
trans_sol2: 固化後將 J 螺栓推入模具中澆注的混凝土混合物中，確保其筆直且方形。

goal: Eliminate odors in the laundry room.
trans_goal: 消除洗衣房內的異味。
sol1: Spray dirty laundry with air freshener, and open a window to clear the room of smell.
trans_sol1: 用空氣清新劑噴灑髒衣服，並打開窗戶清除房間的氣味。
sol2: Combine baking soda and essential oil.  Place in an open jar in laundry room.
trans_sol2: 將小蘇打和精油混合。放入洗衣房的開放罐子中。

goal: How do I fill holes and tiny gaps in the concrete when making a concrete countertop?
trans_goal: 製作混凝土檯面時如何填充混凝土中的孔洞和微小間隙？
sol1: Use  a concrete slurry
trans_sol1: 使用混凝土漿料
sol2: Use  a concrete brush
trans_sol2: 使用混凝土刷

goal: a bucket
trans_goal: 一個桶
sol1: can hold acid
trans_sol1: 可以容納酸
sol2: can hold paint

goal: When I'm deep frying a turkey, how defrosted should it be?
trans_goal: 當我油炸火雞時，應該如何解凍？
sol1: It should be completely defrosted, otherwise the oil may boil over and start a fire.
trans_sol1: 必須完全解凍，否則油可能會沸騰並引發火災。
sol2: It should be completely frozen, otherwise the oil may boil over and start a fire.
trans_sol2: 它應該完全冷凍，否則油可能會沸騰並引發火災。

goal: How do you remove gum from being stuck in hair?
trans_goal: 如何去除粘在頭髮上的口香糖？
sol1: Apply an ice cube and gently remove the hardened gum.
trans_sol1: 用冰塊輕輕地去除硬化的口香糖。
sol2: Use a blow dryer and gently remove melted gum.
trans_sol2: 使用吹風機輕輕去除融化的口香糖。

goal: fire
trans_goal: 火
sol1: can melt humans
trans_sol1: 可以融化人類
sol2: can melt water
trans_sol2: 可以融化水

goal: How long should liquid nails dry?
trans_goal: 液體指甲應乾燥多長時間？
sol1: Just because liquid nails look dry in a short period of time it does not mean it is dried to maximum strength.
trans_sol1: 僅僅因為液體指甲在短時間內看起來乾燥，並不意味著它已經乾燥至最大強度。
sol2: Liquid nails should be adhered to surfaces for 24 hours, taking a full week to completely cure to maximum strength
trans_sol2: 液體指甲應粘附在表面 24 小時，需要整整一周才能完全固化至最大強度

goal: To get the best deal at amusement parks,
trans_goal: 為了在遊樂園獲得最優惠的價格，
sol1: buy a seasonal pass, so you can go all winter long for one discounted rate.
trans_sol1: 購買季節性通行證，這樣您就可以以折扣價度過整個冬天。
sol2: buy a seasonal pass, so you can go all summer long for one discounted rate.
trans_sol2: 購買季節性通行證，這樣您就可以享受整個夏天的折扣價格。

goal: One seeks to make a cord weave.
trans_goal: 人們試圖製作一種繩索編織物。
sol1: One will need a short amount of cord.
trans_sol1: 人們需要一小段電線。
sol2: One will need a long amount of cord.
trans_sol2: 人們需要一根很長的繩子。

goal: To make wires look like tree branches on a wire tree.
trans_goal: 使電線看起來像電線樹上的樹枝。
sol1: Bend wires grouped tightly together into loops. Use kitchen scissors to cut in the middle of the loops. Use needle nose pliers to pull strands of wires away from each other to look like branches.
trans_sol1: 將緊密組合在一起的電線彎曲成環。使用廚房剪刀在環的中間剪斷。使用尖嘴鉗將多股電線拉開，使其看起來像樹枝。
sol2: Bend wires grouped tightly together into loops. Use wire cutters to cut in the middle of the loops. Use needle nose pliers to pull strands of wires away from each other to look like branches.
trans_sol2: 將緊密組合在一起的電線彎曲成環。使用鋼絲鉗在環的中間切割。使用尖嘴鉗將多股電線拉開，使其看起來像樹枝。

goal: How do I remove wrinkles from a new leather jacket that has never been worn
trans_goal: 從未穿過的新皮夾克上的皺紋如何去除
sol1: After taking a hot shower, hang the jacket in the bedroom closet but don't let it touch any water. The steam from the shower should help get rid of the wrinkles.
trans_sol1: 洗完熱水澡後，將夾克掛在臥室衣櫃裡，但不要讓它接觸任何水。淋浴時產生的蒸汽應該有助於消除皺紋。
sol2: After taking a hot shower, hang the jacket in the shower but don't let it touch any water. The steam from the shower should help get rid of the wrinkles.
trans_sol2: 洗完熱水澡後，將夾克掛在淋浴間中，但不要讓它接觸任何水。淋浴時產生的蒸汽應該有助於消除皺紋。

goal: Kill fruit flies easily.
trans_goal: 輕鬆殺死果蠅。
sol1: Spray with alcohol, then sweep away.
trans_sol1: 用酒精噴灑，然後掃掉。
sol2: Spray with water, then sweep away.
trans_sol2: 用水噴灑，然後掃走。

goal: To prevent splinters from cut wood,
trans_goal: 為了防止切割木頭時產生碎片，
sol1: use a fine grained sandpaper to sand down rough cut edges.
trans_sol1: 使用細粒砂紙打磨粗糙的切割邊緣。
sol2: use a fine grained nail file to sand down rough cut edges.
trans_sol2: 使用細粒指甲銼打磨粗糙的切割邊緣。

goal: Trim apple trees.
trans_goal: 修剪蘋果樹。
sol1: Use a chainsaw to cut all the limbs off the tree.
trans_sol1: 使用電鋸鋸掉樹上的所有樹枝。
sol2: Get your limb trimmer out and sharpen the blades with a stone.
trans_sol2: 拿出你的肢體修剪器，用石頭磨利刀片。

goal: How to easily form a perfectly round snowball?
trans_goal: 如何輕鬆捏出一個正圓的雪球？
sol1: Once the basic ball is formed, heat up a hand warmer and keeping it in your hand shape a circle out of the snowball
trans_sol1: 基本球形成後，加熱暖手器並將其放在手中，將雪球塑造成圓形
sol2: Before the basic ball is formed, heat up a hand warmer and keeping it in your pocket shape a circle out of the snowball
trans_sol2: 在基本球形成之前，加熱暖手器並將其放在口袋中，使雪球形成一個圓圈

goal: How do I get my coffee to taste less dark?
trans_goal: 如何讓我的咖啡味道不那麼黑？
sol1: Add a little bit of milk or creamer to the coffee.
trans_sol1: 在咖啡中添加一點牛奶或奶精。
sol2: Add a little bit of more coffee to the drink.
trans_sol2: 在飲料中再加一點咖啡。

goal: how do you use headphones?
trans_goal: 你如何使用耳機？
sol1: plug them into your device.
trans_sol1: 將它們插入您的設備。
sol2: plug them into your device and then place the headphones over your head to where each side is covering your ears.
trans_sol2: 將它們插入您的設備，然後將耳機戴在頭上，直至兩側都覆蓋您的耳朵。

goal: After staining wood, you should
trans_goal: 木材染色後，您應該
sol1: Allow it to sit for several hours so the stain can dry
trans_sol1: 讓其靜置幾個小時，以便污漬乾燥
sol2: Allow it to sit for several months so the stain can dry
trans_sol2: 讓其靜置幾個月，以便污漬乾燥

goal: How to order room service
trans_goal: 如何預訂客房服務
sol1: Pick up the landline phone in your hotel room or villa. Dial the number provided for room service or zero for the operator. Order from the menu.
trans_sol1: 拿起酒店房間或別墅的固定電話。撥打提供客房服務的號碼或撥打接線員的零號。從菜單上點菜。
sol2: Pick up the landline phone in your hotel room or village. Dial the number provided for room service or zero for the operator. Order from the menu.
trans_sol2: 拿起酒店房間或村莊的固定電話。撥打提供客房服務的號碼或撥打接線員的零號。從菜單上點菜。

goal: How to sneak past guards in Metal Gear NES?
trans_goal: 如何在《Metal Gear NES》中潛入守衛？
sol1: Wait until they say "I feel asleep!" and walk past, or wait until they face another direction.
trans_sol1: 等到他們說“我睡著了！”然後走過去，或者等到他們面向另一個方向。
sol2: Wait until they say "I'm feeling sleepy!" and walk past, or wait until they face another direction.
trans_sol2: 等到他們說“我困了！”然後走過去，或者等到他們面向另一個方向。

goal: What are the benefits of anti-allergen vacuum cleaners?
trans_goal: 抗過敏吸塵器有哪些好處？
sol1: Even though they are much more expensive, anti-allergen vacuum cleaners, by preventing allergens from being present in you home, will keep your family much healthier in the long run.
trans_sol1: 儘管抗過敏真空吸塵器價格昂貴得多，但通過防止家中出現過敏原，從長遠來看將使您的家人更加健康。
sol2: Even though they are much less expensive, anti-allergen vacuum cleaners, by preventing allergens from being present in you home, will keep your family much healthier in the long run.
trans_sol2: 儘管抗過敏真空吸塵器的價格要便宜得多，但通過防止家中出現過敏原，從長遠來看，將使您的家人更加健康。

goal: How do you make an oil and vinegar dressing?
trans_goal: 如何製作油醋醬？
sol1: 3 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil (or a more neutral-flavored oil like grapeseed, canola, or vegetable) 1 tablespoon white wine vinegar (or balsamic, apple cider, rice, sherry, or other wine vinegar) Pinch of kosher salt. A turn of freshly ground black pepper.
trans_sol1: 3 湯匙特級初榨橄欖油（或中性風味的油，如葡萄籽油、菜籽油或蔬菜油） 1 湯匙白葡萄酒醋（或香脂醋、蘋果醋、大米醋、雪利酒醋或其他酒醋） 少許粗鹽。一圈現磨的黑胡椒。
sol2: 3 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil (or a more neutral-flavored oil like grapeseed, canola, or vegetable) 1 tablespoon white wine vinegar (or balsamic, apple cider, rice, sherry, or other wine vinegar) Pinch of kosher salt. A turn of freshly ground red pepper.
trans_sol2: 3 湯匙特級初榨橄欖油（或中性風味的油，如葡萄籽油、菜籽油或蔬菜油） 1 湯匙白葡萄酒醋（或香脂醋、蘋果醋、大米醋、雪利酒醋或其他酒醋） 少許粗鹽。一圈現磨的紅辣椒。

goal: Avoid germs from hotel bed.
trans_goal: 避免酒店床上的細菌。
sol1: Use a bed sheet under hotel bed.
trans_sol1: 在酒店床下使用床單。
sol2: Use a bed sheet over hotel bed.
trans_sol2: 在酒店床上蓋上床單。

goal: To allow the oil for the turkey fryer to reach the correct cooking temp
trans_goal: 讓火雞煎鍋的油達到正確的烹飪溫度
sol1: Allow approximately 40 mins for the oil to come up to the correct temperature.
trans_sol1: 等待大約 40 分鐘，讓油達到正確的溫度。
sol2: Allow approximately 4 hours for the oil to come up to the correct temperature.
trans_sol2: 大約需要 4 小時，讓油達到正確的溫度。

goal: how to clean a container that held melted wax
trans_goal: 如何清潔裝有熔化蠟的容器
sol1: Heat the measuring cup so that all the wax inside is liquid. Then wipe out measuring cup with a paper towel. Repeat if necessary to get all of the wax out.
trans_sol1: 加熱量杯，使裡面的蠟全部變成液體。然後用紙巾擦拭量杯。如有必要，重複上述步驟以清除所有蠟。
sol2: Heat the measuring cup so that all the wax inside is liquid and rehardened. Then wipe out measuring cup with a paper towel. Repeat if necessary to get all of the wax out.
trans_sol2: 加熱量杯，使裡面所有的蠟都變成液體並重新硬化。然後用紙巾擦拭量杯。如有必要，重複上述步驟以清除所有蠟。

goal: How to light a candle with a deep seated wick?
trans_goal: 如何點燃燭芯較深的蠟燭？
sol1: invert the candle upside down and pull the wick until the lighter can reach it
trans_sol1: 將蠟燭倒置並拉動燭芯，直到打火機能夠觸及它
sol2: invert the candle upside down and use the lighter to reach into the wick to light it
trans_sol2: 將蠟燭倒置，然後用打火機將手伸入燭芯來點燃它

goal: To shape duct tape into a perfect circle.
trans_goal: 將管道膠帶塑造成完美的圓形。
sol1: Use a gasket punch and a hammer.
trans_sol1: 使用墊圈沖頭和錘子。
sol2: Use a nail and a hammer.
trans_sol2: 使用釘子和錘子。

goal: What can you do when someone presses all the buttons on the elevator then gets off and you are in a hurry?
trans_goal: 當有人按下電梯上的所有按鈕然後下車而你很著急時，你該怎麼辦？
sol1: You can avoid stopping at all the floors by pressing the ones you want to skip twice, it will avoid the stop there.
trans_sol1: 您可以通過按兩次要跳過的樓層來避免在所有樓層停留，這樣就可以避免在該樓層停留。
sol2: You can avoid passing all the floors by pressing the ones you want to skip twice, it will avoid the passing of the elevator there.
trans_sol2: 您可以通過按兩次要跳過的樓層來避免通過所有樓層，這樣就可以避免通過那裡的電梯。

goal: What materials are needed to hand sew an article of clothing?
trans_goal: 手工縫製一件衣服需要什麼材料？
sol1: Thread, needle, scissors, material and ruler
trans_sol1: 線、針、剪刀、材料和尺子
sol2: Thread, needle, knife, material and ruler
trans_sol2: 線、針、刀、材料和尺子

goal: To make a hard shelled taco,
trans_goal: 要製作硬殼炸玉米餅，
sol1: put seasoned beef, cheese, and lettuce onto the hard shell.
trans_sol1: 將調味牛肉、奶酪和生菜放在硬殼上。
sol2: put seasoned beef, cheese, and lettuce into the hard shell.
trans_sol2: 將調味牛肉、奶酪和生菜放入硬殼中。

goal: One wants to eat Vegetarian.
trans_goal: 一個人想吃素食。
sol1: One could have Eggs Benedict.
trans_sol1: 可以吃班尼迪克蛋。
sol2: One could have Eggs Florentine.
trans_sol2: 人們可以吃佛羅倫薩雞蛋。

goal: How do I find something I lost on the carpet?
trans_goal: 如何找到丟失在地毯上的東西？
sol1: Put a solid seal on the end of your vacuum and turn it on.
trans_sol1: 在真空吸塵器的末端放置一個牢固的密封件並打開它。
sol2: Put a hair net on the end of your vacuum and turn it on.
trans_sol2: 在吸塵器末端放一個發網並打開它。

goal: To make small candles to float in water,
trans_goal: 為了使小蠟燭漂浮在水中，
sol1: rub a blue candle on a grater over an ice cube tray and fill the tray with melted candle wax, then stick a wick in each cube wrapped around a pencil, after solid pull them out.
trans_sol1: 在冰塊托盤上的刨絲器上擦一根藍色蠟燭，並在托盤中裝滿融化的蠟燭蠟，然後在每個立方體中插入一根纏繞著鉛筆的燈芯，固體後將其拉出。
sol2: rub a blue candle on a grater over an ice cube tray and fill the tray with cold pressed olive oil, then stick a wick in each cube wrapped around a pencil, after solid pull them out.
trans_sol2: 在冰塊托盤上的刨絲器上擦一根藍色蠟燭，並在托盤中倒入冷榨橄欖油，然後將一根燈芯插在每個冰塊上，纏繞在鉛筆上，固體後將其拉出。

goal: To clean your microwave without having to scrub it.
trans_goal: 無需擦洗即可清潔微波爐。
sol1: Fill a bowl with water and microwave it for two to three minutes. The steam will loosen any dried food particles for easy cleaning.
trans_sol1: 將碗裝滿水，然後用微波爐加熱兩到三分鐘。蒸汽會使乾燥的食物顆粒鬆散，以便於清潔。
sol2: Fill a bowl with water and microwave it for two to three seconds. The steam will loosen any dried food particles for easy cleaning.
trans_sol2: 將碗裝滿水，然後用微波爐加熱兩到三秒鐘。蒸汽會使乾燥的食物顆粒鬆散，以便於清潔。

goal: To bend a PVC conduit,
trans_goal: 要彎曲 PVC 導管，
sol1: Use a heat source on the conduit. A flamethrower is recommended. Point the flamethrower  toward the spot you wand the conduit to bend and turn it on. Bend with your hands gently. Be sure to wear gloves doing so or you might be burned.
trans_sol1: 在導管上使用熱源。推薦使用火焰噴射器。將火焰噴射器指向您希望導管彎曲的位置並將其打開。用手輕輕彎曲。一定要戴上手套，否則可能會被燙傷。
sol2: Use a heat source on the conduit. A heat gun is recommended. Point the heat gun toward the spot you wand the conduit to bend and turn it on. Bend with your hands gently. Be sure to wear gloves doing so or you might be burned.
trans_sol2: 在導管上使用熱源。建議使用熱風槍。將熱風槍指向您希望導管彎曲的位置並將其打開。用手輕輕彎曲。一定要戴上手套，否則可能會被燙傷。

goal: Make a camping shower head.
trans_goal: 製作一個野營淋浴噴頭。
sol1: Attach a watering can to a large jug.
trans_sol1: 將噴壺連接到大壺上。
sol2: Attach a watering can to a small jug.
trans_sol2: 將噴壺連接到小水壺上。

goal: Make Halloween lanterns.
trans_goal: 製作萬聖節燈籠。
sol1: Draw ghost faces on full milk bottles, put a candle in each one.
trans_sol1: 在裝滿牛奶的瓶子上畫鬼臉，在每個瓶子裡放一支蠟燭。
sol2: Draw ghost faces on empty milk bottles, put a candle in each one.
trans_sol2: 在空牛奶瓶上畫鬼臉，在每個瓶子裡放一支蠟燭。

goal: change a lightbulb in a ceiling fan
trans_goal: 更換吊扇中的燈泡
sol1: Turn the switch off for the fan and light.Carefully reach up and take hold of the bulb that is blown. If it is hot because it has been on recently, use a cloth to protect your hands. Unscrew the bulb and carefully screw in a new bulb until it breaks in your hand
trans_sol1: 關閉風扇和燈的開關。小心地伸手抓住燒斷的燈泡。如果因為最近使用而感到很熱，請用布保護雙手。擰下燈泡並小心地擰入新燈泡，直到燈泡在手中破裂為止
sol2: Turn the switch off for the fan and light.Carefully reach up and take hold of the bulb that is blown. If it is hot because it has been on recently, use a cloth to protect your hands. Unscrew the bulb and carefully screw in a new bulb until it is tight.
trans_sol2: 關閉風扇和燈的開關。小心地伸手抓住燒斷的燈泡。如果因為最近使用而感到很熱，請用布保護雙手。擰下燈泡並小心地擰入新燈泡直至擰緊。

goal: Which direction to properly install an air filter.
trans_goal: 空氣過濾器的正確安裝方向。
sol1: Air filters can be installed in any direction.
trans_sol1: 空氣過濾器可以任意方向安裝。
sol2: Pay attention to the arrow markers. These indicate which way to insert the filter into the slot.
trans_sol2: 注意箭頭標記。這些指示將過濾器插入插槽的方式。

goal: Protect a bare shiny piece of metal, like a hinge, from rusting.
trans_goal: 保護裸露的閃亮金屬（例如鉸鏈）免於生鏽。
sol1: Use a silver spray paint to seal your fixture, or they will continue to rust and tarnish with time.
trans_sol1: 使用銀色噴漆來密封您的固定裝置，否則它們會隨著時間的推移繼續生鏽和失去光澤。
sol2: Use a clear enamel spray to seal your fixture, or they will continue to rust and tarnish with time.
trans_sol2: 使用透明的搪瓷噴霧來密封您的固定裝置，否則它們會隨著時間的推移繼續生鏽和失去光澤。

goal: making a picture Frame on Your Wrist
trans_goal: 在手腕上製作相框
sol1: Gather your tools and materials, cut out  a watch by taking off the side plate, Cut Foamcore to Fit, Glue on Your Design and Wear Your Watch.
trans_sol1: 準備好工具和材料，取下側板剪出手錶，切割泡沫芯以適合，粘上您的設計並佩戴手錶。
sol2: Gather your tools and materials, gut a watch by taking off the back plate, Cut Foamcore to Fit, Glue on Your Design and Wear Your Watch.
trans_sol2: 準備好工具和材料，取下後板，將手錶拆開，切割泡沫芯以適合，粘上您的設計並佩戴您的手錶。

goal: How do you bake a cheesecake properly?
trans_goal: 如何正確烘烤芝士蛋糕？
sol1: Create a water bath by placing a 12 inch wide cake pan on the middle rack of the oven and bake for one hour in a 350 degree blender.
trans_sol1: 將 12 英寸寬的蛋糕盤放在烤箱的中間架上，創建水浴，然後在 350 度的攪拌機中烘烤一小時。
sol2: Create a water bath by placing a 12 inch wide cake pan on the middle rack of the oven and bake for one hour in a 350 degree oven.
trans_sol2: 將 12 英寸寬的蛋糕盤放在烤箱的中間架上，形成水浴，然後在 350 度的烤箱中烘烤一小時。

goal: Easy way to hang your shoes in your closet.
trans_goal: 將鞋子掛在衣櫃裡的簡單方法。
sol1: Get a piece of wood and attach it about 1 foot from the floor of your closet. Add coat hooks at even intervals and hang your shoes.
trans_sol1: 找一塊木頭，將其固定在距離衣櫃地板約 1 英尺的地方。間隔均勻地添加衣帽鉤並懸掛鞋子。
sol2: Get some coat hooks and attach it about 1 foot from the floor of your closet. Add coat hooks at even intervals and hang your shoes.
trans_sol2: 準備一些衣帽鉤，將其固定在距衣櫃地板約 1 英尺的位置。間隔均勻地添加衣帽鉤並懸掛鞋子。

goal: Get cheap pizza.
trans_goal: 買便宜的披薩。
sol1: Call pizza place and ask for a discount on abandoned pizzas.
trans_sol1: 打電話給披薩店並要求對廢棄的披薩進行折扣。
sol2: Call pizza place and ask for a discount on incomplete cooked pizzas.
trans_sol2: 給披薩店打電話，要求未煮熟的披薩有折扣。

goal: How do you harvest honey from a bee box?
trans_goal: 如何從蜂箱中採集蜂蜜？
sol1: Smoke the bees. Once they are calm, remove the frames that are completely filled with honey from the hive. Use a sharp knife to cut off the wax that caps each comb. Once the combs are all opened, you can use an extractor to drain the honey out of the comb. You can also place the frame over a bucket and let the honey drain into the bucket over a few days time.
trans_sol1: 熏蜜蜂。一旦它們平靜下來，將完全裝滿蜂蜜的框架從蜂巢中取出。用鋒利的刀切掉每個梳子上的蠟。一旦蜂巢全部打開，您可以使用提取器將蜂蜜從蜂巢中排出。您也可以將框架放在桶上，讓蜂蜜在幾天內排入桶中。
sol2: Smoke the bees. Once they are calm, remove the frames that are completely filled with honey from the hive. Use a sharp knife to cut off the comb from each frame. Once the combs are all opened, you can use an extractor to drain the honey out of the comb. You can also place the frame over a bucket and let the honey drain into the bucket over a few days time.
trans_sol2: 熏蜜蜂。一旦它們平靜下來，將完全裝滿蜂蜜的框架從蜂巢中取出。用鋒利的刀從每個框架上切掉梳子。一旦蜂巢全部打開，您可以使用提取器將蜂蜜從蜂巢中排出。您也可以將框架放在桶上，讓蜂蜜在幾天內排入桶中。

goal: What supplies are needed to make a  small decorative Christmas tree?
trans_goal: 製作一棵小型裝飾聖誕樹需要什麼材料？
sol1: Styrofoam cone        Mini plastic spoons        Mixed beads        One ornament star        Scissors        Hot water gun        Gold spray paint
trans_sol1: 保麗龍錐體 迷你塑料勺 混合珠 一件飾品 星星 剪刀 熱水槍 金色噴漆
sol2: Styrofoam cone        Mini plastic spoons        Mixed beads        One ornament star        Scissors        Hot glue gun        Gold spray paint
trans_sol2: 保麗龍錐體 迷你塑料勺子 混合珠 一件飾品 星星剪刀 熱膠槍 金色噴漆

goal: How to create Dorodango (Japanese mud-art).
trans_goal: 如何創作 Dorodango（日本泥畫）。
sol1: Gather dirt, wet it to make mud, and roll it into the shape of a ball, keep adding water so it will remain mud-like, add water whenever it begins to dry.
trans_sol1: 把泥土收集起來，弄濕成泥，搓成球狀，不斷加水，保持泥狀，乾了就加水。
sol2: Gather dirt, wet it to make mud, and roll it into the shape of a ball, let it sit until it dries, then buff it with a cloth.
trans_sol2: 收集泥土，將其弄濕製成泥，然後將其滾成球狀，靜置直至乾燥，然後用布擦亮。

goal: How to sleep in proper posture?
trans_goal: 如何以正確的姿勢睡覺？
sol1: Sleep straight with a pillow over your head.
trans_sol1: 睡覺時將枕頭放在頭上，保持筆直。
sol2: Sleep straight with a pillow under your head.
trans_sol2: 睡覺時將枕頭墊在頭下。

goal: To extend the shelf life of lettuce,
trans_goal: 為了延長生菜的保質期，
sol1: wrap it in paper towels before storing it in a bag.
trans_sol1: 在將其存放在袋子中之前，用紙巾將其包裹起來。
sol2: wrap it in foil wrap instead of storing it in a bag.
trans_sol2: 用箔紙包裹它，而不是將其存放在袋子中。

goal: To dye the white fondant to make the fondant roses
trans_goal: 將白色軟糖染色以製作軟糖玫瑰
sol1: Dip the fondant in the food coloring and then rub in  the food coloring  then knead until the color is evenly distributed
trans_sol1: 將軟糖浸入食用色素中，然後揉搓食用色素，然後揉捏直至顏色均勻分佈
sol2: Dip a toothpick in the food coloring and then rub the food coloring onto the white fondant, then knead until the color is evenly distributed
trans_sol2: 用牙籤蘸上食用色素，然後將食用色素擦到白色翻糖上，然後揉捏直至顏色均勻分佈

goal: To make seed starter pots
trans_goal: 製作種子啟動盆
sol1: use balled toilet paper  with some soil and a seed
trans_sol1: 使用帶有一些土壤和種子的團狀衛生紙
sol2: use a toilet paper roll with some soil and a seed
trans_sol2: 使用帶有一些土壤和種子的衛生紙捲

goal: To prepare a loaf pan for Blueberry Lemon Financiers.
trans_goal: 為藍莓檸檬金融家準備麵包盤。
sol1: Grease and flour a six-cavity mini loaf pan or a standard 12-cavity muffin pan.
trans_sol1: 在六腔迷你麵包盤或標準 12 腔鬆餅盤中塗上油脂並撒上麵粉。
sol2: Grease and sugar a six-cavity mini loaf pan or a standard 12-cavity muffin pan.
trans_sol2: 在六腔迷你麵包盤或標準 12 腔鬆餅盤中塗上油脂並加糖。

goal: How can I raise and lower a picavet with a camera attached so it can be flown with a kite?
trans_goal: 如何升高和降低帶有相機的皮卡維特以便可以用風箏飛行？
sol1: You would implement a pulley system with wheels and strong string.
trans_sol1: 您將實現一個帶有輪子和堅固繩子的滑輪系統。
sol2: You would implement a pulley system with carabiners and strong string.
trans_sol2: 您將實施一個帶有登山扣和堅固繩子的滑輪系統。

goal: Increase ability to learn something new.
trans_goal: 提高學習新事物的能力。
sol1: Diffuse vegetable oil.
trans_sol1: 擴散植物油。
sol2: Diffuse cinnamon essential oil.
trans_sol2: 擴香肉桂精油。

goal: When building a survival fishing kit, what can you use to make fishing hooks?
trans_goal: 在製作救生釣魚套件時，可以使用什麼來製作魚鉤？
sol1: Carefully bend a safety pin into a hook shape with pliers and fasten it to a thin paracord to create a makeshift fishing line.
trans_sol1: 用鉗子小心地將安全別針彎曲成鉤形，並將其固定在細傘繩上，形成臨時釣魚線。
sol2: Carefully bend a paper clip into a hook shape with pliers and fasten it to a thin paracord to create a makeshift fishing line.
trans_sol2: 用鉗子小心地將回形針彎曲成鉤形，然後將其固定在細傘繩上，形成臨時釣魚線。

goal: How can I set my umbrella up on my deck more effectively?
trans_goal: 如何更有效地將雨傘放在甲板上？
sol1: Mount several sets of galvanized plumbing pipe straps on the deck posts or railing in key places. Use straps with a much narrower diameter than the umbrella pole. Then just pick a spot and slip the umbrella pole through the straps until the bottom of the pole rests on the deck.
trans_sol1: 在關鍵部位的甲板柱或欄杆上安裝多套鍍鋅水管管帶。使用直徑比傘桿窄得多的帶子。然後，只需選擇一個位置，將傘桿穿過帶子，直到傘桿的底部放在甲板上。
sol2: Mount several sets of galvanized plumbing pipe straps on the deck posts or railing in key places. Use straps with a slightly wider diameter than the umbrella pole. Then just pick a spot and slip the umbrella pole through the straps until the bottom of the pole rests on the deck.
trans_sol2: 在關鍵部位的甲板柱或欄杆上安裝多套鍍鋅水管管帶。使用直徑比傘桿稍寬的帶子。然後，只需選擇一個位置，將傘桿穿過帶子，直到傘桿的底部放在甲板上。

goal: To remove sharpie pen from a couch,
trans_goal: 要從沙發上取下記號筆，
sol1: soak the area in soy milk so that the region is colored by it.
trans_sol1: 將該區域浸泡在豆漿中，使該區域被豆漿著色。
sol2: soak the stained area in milk for an hour and then rub away.
trans_sol2: 將污漬區域浸泡在牛奶中一個小時，然後擦掉。

goal: To remove folds and creases from a sewing pattern
trans_goal: 去除縫紉圖案中的折疊和摺痕
sol1: set a clothing iron on low and carefully iron the pattern to remove folds and creases before pinning to your fabric.
trans_sol1: 將熨斗調低，仔細熨燙圖案，去除褶皺和摺痕，然後再別到布料上。
sol2: set a clothing iron on high and carefully iron the pattern to remove folds and creases before pinning to your fabric.
trans_sol2: 將熨斗調高，仔細熨燙圖案，去除褶皺和摺痕，然後再別到布料上。

goal: how to get perfectly done grilled meat
trans_goal: 如何完美完成烤肉
sol1: move closer to the coals the longer it has been on. when almost finished, move directly on top of the coals.
trans_sol1: 燃燒時間越長，離煤炭越近。快完成時，直接移到煤上。
sol2: Take your meat and fish off the grill a few seconds before it's perfectly done because it cooks an extra 5–10 degrees when resting
trans_sol2: 在肉和魚完全烤熟之前幾秒鐘將其從烤架上取下，因為休息時溫度會額外升高 5-10 度
